select m.FPersonID as id, m.fpersonid,m.FPositionID,p.fname_l2 as zwName,c.fname_l2 as personName, c.fid as userId,c.fnumber as person,c.FDELETEDSTATUS as deleteStatus,p.FAdminOrgUnitID as unitId, o.FLONGNUMBER as orgLongNumber,o.FNAME_L2 as orgName,t.FNAME_L2 as typeName from T_ORG_PositionMember m left join T_ORG_Position p on p.fid=m.FPositionID left join T_BD_Person c on c.fid=m.FPersonID left join T_ORG_BASEUNIT o on o.fid=p.FAdminOrgUnitID left join T_HR_BDEmployeeType t on t.FID=c.FEMPLOYEETYPEID
c.fname_l2 is not null
and c.FDeletedStatus=1
and c.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{personName}),'%')
and c.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{personNumber}),'%')
and p.FAdminOrgUnitID in
#{item}
or p.FAdminOrgUnitID in
#{item}
select distinct FNAME_L2 from t_bd_person where fnumber =#{person}

select DISTINCT p.FNUMBER from t_bd_person p left join T_ORG_PositionMember m on p.fid=m.fpersonid left join t_org_position a on a.fid=m.fpositionid left join T_ORG_BaseUnit b on a.fadminorgunitid=b.fid where b.fid in ('d90AAAAASfLM567U','d90AAAAANNPM567U','d90AAAAANNTM567U')
